title: Total Submission
description: Her secrets are tearing us apart, but I can’t give up on us yet. When I’m with her, the beast inside me is tamed. My every craving sated by her gentle touch.I won’t let her go without a fight.No matter what the cost, I will protect her. She belongs to me now.*Part three of the sensual, suspenseful new serial*
author: Roxy Sloane
